comments.body:
Would a templated class here make sense ? The box type is fixed for the entire box set right ?
This will also avoid having multiple functions `AddBox`, `AddCone` and so on...

@rete REveDigitset uses REveChunkManager template to make optimize memory usage for large sets (e.g. hounded thousand digits). Maybe REveBoxSet is not the best class name because it is a set of generic 3D objects.
